## Description {#details}

Adapt a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/detail/inmemoryfile">InMemoryFile</a> for VFS&#39; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/file">File</a> interface.

The goal is to make <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vfs/detail/anonymous-namespace-virtualfilesystem-cpp-/inmemoryfileadaptor">InMemoryFileAdaptor</a></code> mimic as much as possible the behavior of <code>RealFile</code>.

Definition at line 735 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/virtualfilesystem-cpp">VirtualFileSystem.cpp</a>.
